text: Question here. I have a client that prefer to keep their typeform moving forward but would like to opt-in submissions of that typeform to HubSpot marketing emails from their company. Is there an easy way to trigger a marketing subscription to be Active for a contact if the submission is coming from a typeform?

These may be a starting point:
<https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/apps/marketing/lead-generation/typeform>
<https://www.typeform.com/help/a/hub-spot-integration-installation-and-setup-360029578071/>
